feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.33.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Support multiple relationships same tables by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14877
  • Gro 738 refactor code that returns the account holder from user by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14872

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.33.3...2.33.4

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.33.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Publish automation-branching-ux to QA by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14889
  • Fix automation log pagination by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14895
  • Public role access issue by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14898

This is the first release after a problem in our release pipeline, releases 2.33.5 to 2.33.11 are unavailable.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.33.4...2.33.5

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.33.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Reenable cache by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14916
  • Nodemon config update by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14919
  • Fix builder serve endpoint error rate by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14923
  • Improve users sort by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14894
  • Don't throw if no account-holder is found by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14926

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.33.12...2.33.13

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.33.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix handling of the Postgres money field. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14931

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.33.13...2.33.14

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • New data UI by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14442
  • Filter groups by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14546
  • Update view handling of filters by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14614
  • Default view permissions to parent table roles by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14597
  • Default values for options and array types (frontend) by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14635
  • View changes - merge to V3 UI branch by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14694
  • Fixes an issue where id and revision weren't passed to row action automations by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14701
  • Run rowAction from table only if allowed by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14706
  • Fix relationship cell containing reference to deleted code by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14793
  • Prevent view queryUI transforms mutating state by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14792
  • Add default value toggle for both single and multi user columns by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14777
  • Fix view join parser for non-array values any "many" types by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14790
  • Budi 8677 ai column type v1 by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14711
  • Fix filter drawer visibility in component popovers by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14805
  • Don't extend dataprovider queries when no extensions are in use by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14804
  • Display numbers using locale format in tables by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14821
  • Default user columns to current user for templates by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14839
  • Preview role - multi-inheritance fixes by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14844
  • BB AI QA testing fixes by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14846
  • New RBAC UI by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14577
  • Row action name cleanup by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14849
  • Make queryUI on ViewV2 something you can write on its own, and query gets filled in for you by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14818
  • Role validation - allow permissionId to be optional by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14853
  • Make sure processSearchFilters handles an undefined input. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14852
  • Trigger info data in the frontend by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14854
  • Frontend updates for storing view filters in queryUI by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14857
  • Calculation Views UI by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14778
  • Missing old row on automations by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14862
  • Allow overriding the min version where we stop serving the power role by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14864
  • Misc V3 improvements by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14865
  • Delete row actions when removing a datasource by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14859
  • Remove row actions when unfetching tables by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14860
  • Remove lightest and dark themes and add core types and utils for themes by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14858
  • Allow bigints in calculations by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14878
  • Fix default values when using multi-option column and supplying empty array. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14896
  • Support boolean and bigint fields having default values. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14897
  • Support view RBAC with forms and cache view definitions by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14899
  • Fix new filtering for with queries by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14871
  • Data section toolbar standardisation by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14888
  • Account for logicalOperator inside UISearchFilter groups by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14904
  • Conditions reactivity fix + row actions improvement by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14921
  • Fix view calculations with relationships by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14924
  • Allow fields on count calculations. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14928
  • Ai fixes by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14918
  • Throw an error when attempting to bulkImport a relationship field into an internal table. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14925
  • Allow tables to handle _id values in non DS+ rows by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14929
  • Allow counting non-numeric fields in calculation views by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14930
  • Fix flaky export test. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14932
  • Sample data fix by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14937
  • Minor OpenAPI updates by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14939
  • Switch QA to v3-ui by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14938
  • V3 UI by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14556

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.33.14...3.0.0
